mapper.select: SELECT タスク管理id AS ID, タスク名 AS taskname, 開始日 AS startdate, 期日 AS deadlinedate, かかる時間 AS Requiredtime, 内容 AS content, 優先度 AS priorityID FROM t_tasks WHERE タスク管理id = #{taskID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT 内容 AS content, 小タスクID AS SmallID, タスク管理ID AS TaskID, 完了フラグ AS compleate FROM t_small_task WHERE タスク管理id = #{taskID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND 削除フラグ = FALSE
